description: SQLite 3 System Catalog Metadata - sqlite_master and pragma_* reference for building and validating SQL statements. NOT loaded by application at runtime.
purpose: Reference file for building and validating SQL statements in sqlite_3_sql_statements.json. NOT loaded by application at runtime.
usage_notes: This file is a REFERENCE ONLY - used by developers/AI to understand SQLite system catalog structure
SQLite uses sqlite_master (or sqlite_schema) and PRAGMA table-valued functions
All application SQL statements must be defined in sqlite_3_sql_statements.json, not here

sqlite_master.description: One row per table, index, view, trigger

pragma_table_info(table_name).description: Table-valued: column info for a table

pragma_foreign_key_list(table_name).description: Table-valued: foreign keys for a table
